column2: "Ao
column3: nkyɛ hom eesie abotar etsie me nkwaseasɛm kakra ae! Nyew

column2: "Na medze Nyankopɔn ho nyinkun twe hom ho nyinkun
column3: dɛ magye hom awar ama ɔbarimba baako
column4: dɛ medze hom dɛ ɔbaabun krɔnn rekɛma Kraest."

column2: "Na musuro dɛ bɛyɛ na oedua biribi do dɛ mbrɛ ɔwɔ no dze enyitsew daadaa Eve no
column3: dɛmara so na wɔasɛɛ hom adwen efi nokwardzi nye krɔnnyɛ a hom wɔ wɔ Kraest afamu no ho."

column2: "Na sɛ nyia ɔba no ka Jesus fofor bi ho asɛm a yɛnnkae
column3: anaa hom nya sunsum fofor bi a hom nnyae
column4: anaa asɛmpa fofor bi a hom nngyee a

column2: "Na mubu dɛ mennka asomafo etsitsir no ekyir wɔ biribiara mu."
"Kaansa meyɛ mberɛw wɔ kasa mu a
column4: na adze nyina mu yɛada iyi edzi wɔ nyimpa nyina mu wɔ hom afamu."

column2: "Anaa bɔn na mayɛ dɛ mabrɛ moho adze ma wɔaama hom do
column3: osiandɛ mebɛkaa hom Nyankopɔn asɛmpa no kwa?"

column2: "Mefaa asɔr binom hɔ adze dɛ akatua dɛ medze robɔsom hom;"
"na mowɔ hom nkyɛn na adze hiaa me no
column5: enuanom a wofi Masidonia bae no maa me nsa kae; na adze nyina mu mohwɛɛ moho dɛ mennkɛyɛ adzesoa ama hom

column2: "Kraest no nokwar wɔ mo mu yi
column3: obiara rinnsiw me kwan wɔ ahohyehyɛ yi ho wɔ Akaiaman no mu hɔ."

column2: "Ebɛnadze ntsi a? Dɛ monndɔ hom ntsi a? Nyankopɔn na onyim."
"Na dza meyɛ no
column4: na maamma hɔn a wɔrohwehwɛ mo ho kwan no ennya kwan
column5: na woeehu hɔn wɔ dza wɔdze hyehyɛ hɔnho no mu dɛ hɛnara."

column2: "Na dɛm nyimpa no
"Na ɔnnyɛ nwanwa
column3: osiandɛ Satan mpo dan noho dɛ kan bɔfo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔnnyɛ adze kɛse bi dɛ n'asomfo so bɛdan hɔnho dɛ tsenenee asomfo: hɔn na hɔn ewiei bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse."
"Meka bio dɛ
column4: na sɛ ɔtse dɛm mpo a
column6: na mo so menhyehyɛ moho kakra."

column2: "Dza meka no
"Ɔnam dɛ piinara hyehyɛ hɔnho wɔ honam afamu ntsi
"Na hom dze enyigye gye nkwasea
"Sɛ obi dze hom ba nkowaasom ase
column6: sɛ ɔbɔ hom enyi do a

column2: "Meka no enyimguase mu
column3: dɛ gyama hɛn dze yɛyɛ mberɛw
column4: naaso dza obi dze tuw no (merekasa dɛ mbrɛ aba biara nnyi mu)

column2: "Wɔyɛ Hebriwfo? Mo so meyɛ bi. Wɔyɛ Israelfo? Mo so meyɛ bi. Wɔyɛ Abraham asefo? Mo so meyɛ bi."
"Wɔyɛ Kraest asomfo? Merekasa dɛ ɔbɔdamfo
column3: meyɛ no somfo kyɛn hɔn; ndwumadzen mu a

column2: "Jewfo nsamu mpɛn enum na magye mbaa eduanan a woyi do kor."
"Wɔkaa me mpire mprɛnsa
column4: me hɛn abɔ wɔ po do mprɛnsa
column5: medzi bun mu adzekyee nye adzesaa;"

column2: "akwantu pii mu
"edwumayɛ nye ɔberɛ
"Iyinom nyina da nkyɛn a
column3: dza ɔhyɛ mo do daa daa nye asɔrasɔr no nyina ho kɔdaannda."

column2: "Woana na ɔyɛ mberɛw na mennyɛ bi? Woana na wɔato no fintsidua na ɔnnhyehye me?"
"Sɛ ɔsɛ dɛ mehyehyɛ moho a
column3: dza medze bɛhyehyɛ moho nye dza ɔkyerɛ me mberɛwyɛ."

column2: "Hɛn Ewuradze Jesus ne Nyankopɔn nye n'Egya a wohyira no afebɔɔ no
"Damaskɔs
column3: ɔhen Aretas n'ambrado weɔɔn Damaskɔsfo kurow no dɛ ɔrepɛ me akyer me;"
